extension.summary: Adds a subtitles dialog contextmenu button
extension.description: Adds a subtitles dialog contextmenu button to context menu, so you can use the subtitles dialog also when kodi is not playing.[CR] You can use the manual search button to check if subtitles exist, or focus on an item and it will automatically check it for you without typing.[CR][CR]Only supported by these addons and above:[CR]Subscenter.org (4.1.2)[CR]Ktuvit.com (4.5.1)[CR]TheWiz Subs (1.1.4)[CR]Torec (1.2.1)
